comments:
For org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.jdt, build 10/25/06

Open the properties page for a Java project, click on "Add library" and select "Connectivity Driver Instance". The st below appears. Inspecting the org.eclipse.datatools.connectivity.jdt_*.jar, I see that the class in question is present.
